policy

Interface Policy<K>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolicyLRU, PolicyMRU

    public interface Policy<K>
    A replacement policy used to select which item to be evicted from the cache.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      K evict(int index)
      Selects a key used to evict an item from the cache.
      void getUpdate(int index, K key)
      Performs an update to the Policy when the cache performs a get call.
      void putUpdate(int index, K key)
      Performs an update to the Policy when the cache performs a put call.
      void setCacheSize(int blocksPerSet, int numberOfSets)
      Sets the cache's dimensions for the Policy to use when the cache is first constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • evict

        K evict(int index)
        Selects a key used to evict an item from the cache.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of an individual set located within the cache.
        Returns:
        Returns the key to select the item to be evicted.

      • getUpdate

        void getUpdate(int index,
               K key)
        Performs an update to the Policy when the cache performs a get call.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of an individual set located within the cache.
        key - The key item used for lookup of an item within the cache.

      • putUpdate

        void putUpdate(int index,
               K key)
        Performs an update to the Policy when the cache performs a put call.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of an individual set located within the cache.
        key - The key item used for lookup of an item within the cache.

      • setCacheSize

        void setCacheSize(int blocksPerSet,
                  int numberOfSets)
        Sets the cache's dimensions for the Policy to use when the cache is first constructed.
        Parameters:
        blocksPerSet - Number of items within a set.
        numberOfSets - Number of sets within the cache.
